It comes with dual stereo speakers for loud and clear audio. Equipped with up to a 108 MP pro-grade camera, it enables precise and detailed photography and videography.

Upgrade to the Redmi 5A smartphone with its fully-laminated HD display. Powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon 425 processor, it ensures smooth performance. Capture scenic shots and group photos with its 13 MP camera with PDAF. It features a 3000 mAh battery providing up to 8 days of standby time.

The ASUS VivoBook 14 is an entry-level laptop that offers powerful performance and immersive visuals. It features a NanoEdge display and a matte anti-glare coating for an engaging experience. Easy portability ensures effortless productivity whether for work or play.

The Acer Aspire Lite Laptop is powered by an 11th Gen Intel Core i3-1115G4 processor and features 8GB RAM and a 512GB SSD. It boasts a 39.62cm (15.6") Full HD Display with a metal body design in steel gray, weighing just 1.59 KG. Enjoy a premium computing experience with this thin and light laptop.

The Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3 Laptop features a slim and elegant design, making it easy to carry wherever you go. With up to 19.9 mm thinness, it's lightweight and portable. Whether for work or play, this laptop ensures reliable performance and seamless multitasking.
